channel.title: Social Skills on AIXWIM
channel.description: Recent content in Social Skills on AIXWIM

item.title: The Powerful Benefits of Art-Based Activities for Child Development
item.description: Discover how art-based activities foster social, emotional, and cognitive growth in children. Learn the long-term benefits of incorporating art into a child's development.

item.title: What Makes an After-School Program Successful?
item.description: Discover the key elements that make an after-school program successful and how to choose the right program for your child.
